website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive model with surprising power. Its size and versatility make it a good fit for most homes.
pros: Despite the low price tag, this vacuum offers excellent suction
The 1-liter canister means you don't need to stop in the middle of vacuuming

website_summaries.verdict: This vacuum is powerful, lightweight, and easy to clean and store.
pros: Wide nozzle covers a lot of area quickly
Adjustable height  for any surface, from thick carpet to hardwood
Compact vacuum at just over 10 pounds is lightweight enough for almost anyone to maneuver or carry
Easy-access dust cup is larger than on many bagless vacuums
cons: The vacuum runs louder than some other models

website_summaries.verdict: A powerful vacuum that is built for numerous chores and has many user-friendly features, proving that you don't have to spend a lot of money for a reliable cleaning tool.
pros: Affordably priced and packed with features, including ample onboard accessories and an easy-to-clean filter
Delivers decent suction on all types of floor surfaces and is lightweight (10 lbs.)
Dirt cup is easy to remove and clean
cons: Head is on the bulky side and won't fit into some tight spaces

customer_reviews.title: Buying Anxiety?
customer_reviews.text: Are you struggling to make a decision because you REALLY need a vacuum and are on a tight budget and decided to read the reviews to help you decide? Well I'm writing to let you know this one won't be a mistake. I considered this a big risky purchase and am here to tell you the vacuum works great. I've only has it for about a month so I can't comment on the durability, but as to the performance for the price, it has exceeded my expectations. I'm very happy with the suction power and it's attachments work great. Hope this helps you make your decision!
customer_reviews.author: Jitterbug

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding machine for the price! Very light. Great suction. Easy transition from carpet to rugs to wood floor. Easy to empty. Picture is what I picked up from the 1st floor of the house the 1st day of using (after 5 days of a broken old vacuum). Impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan A Schulte

customer_reviews.title: Good vacuum but way too noisy.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a good little vacuum. It handles very easy because of it's light weight. It cleans the carpet good. I also like the washable filter and easy empty dust canister. What I don't like is the ear splitting whistle while vacuuming. I can handle the roar of the motor and the roller but the whistle is too much. I will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: justme

customer_reviews.title: Great Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum. It's light weight, and cleans well. The dirt holder is super easy to dump and clean. It's great not having to deal with bags. If buying from Amazon, always check Fakespot.com to make sure that reviews are legit. This product rated an A.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum is so powerful when I was vacuuming my ...
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is so powerful when I was vacuuming my newly washed comferter to remove the cat hair. I stopped after just a couple of swipes with the hose & atatchment that has the little red lintbrush looking stips on it & OMG! u shulda seen All the dust& dirt it pulled out of it & as I said earlier I just washed it .wow u all did not have enough stars for me to properly rate it.
customer_reviews.author: Anna M.

customer_reviews.title: Vacuum is light weight, has good cleaning suction and 'manicures' carpeting well
customer_reviews.text: At this price point I shouldn't expect the world. Vacuum is light weight, has good cleaning suction and 'manicures' carpeting well. Main complaint is the extension hose... it's simply too short as well as being attached too high on the unit. Every attempt to use the wand or brush attachments results in the machine tipping over. I vacuumed almost every inch of a 2,200 sf house (including closets and bathrooms) during it's first use without issue... other than tipping it over dozens of times. At least nothing broke or snapped off...
customer_reviews.author: J LI NY

customer_reviews.title: Good luck reaching cobwebs on a chair
customer_reviews.text: It is definitely lightweight, but it's the kind of plastic that will shatter if you bang it on a corner. My only real complaint is the hose for reaching high places is soo short that you have to carry the whole base with you. Good luck reaching cobwebs on a chair!! Otherwise, it was worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Monty Burns

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest investment
customer_reviews.text: I just used this vacuum for the first time and it scatters the dirt on bare floors, and you have to go over spots repeatedly. It's also very loud!!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Joseph

customer_reviews.title: The attachments are easy to use and set up
customer_reviews.text: Very light and works smoothly on carpets and floors. The attachments are easy to use and set up. Really happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: It started smoking after the first use.
customer_reviews.text: Started smoking after first use. Do not buy, use money toward better product.
customer_reviews.author: Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 1 Month and now broken. Cheap parts, terrible purchase
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this vacuum and was immediately turned off by the cheapness. The parts appears to have been made with the same material as children's toys. Within 30 days of using it, it is officially broken, no idea what caused it to break. Save your money and purchase a better vacuum. Waste of $60!
customer_reviews.author: JRT

customer_reviews.title: Solid vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This is a good vacuum cleaner. It has good suction power and deep cleans carpet well. I only wish it had a retractable power cord like the last vacuum cleaner I used. Other than that, it's solid.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great for picking up pet hair and can be used on multiple surfaces!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how well this vacuum works. It looks like it might be a little flimsy, but it really packs a punch. I have a 24lb Maine Coon that sheds everywhere so I am constantly cleaning up. There are settings for hard floors and different types of carpeting as well. The tank is super easy to clean out and I am always amazed by how much dirt I pick up. Save yourself some cash and buy this vacuum cleaner if you are in the market!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Moore

customer_reviews.title: this thing SUCKS....no pun intended
customer_reviews.text: the worst vacuum EVER! have used it no more than 5 times and it leaves pushes out more hair and dander than actually sucking it up. my room smells like smoke after i’m done vacuuming and my bedroom carpet looks like i never vacuumed. the compartments don’t work nor do they have a placement holder. DO NOT BUY! waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: FALLING APART AFTER 3 WEEKS OF MINIMAL USE
customer_reviews.text: ITS EASY TO ASSEMBLE. HAS BIG CONTAINER TO HOLD DIRT (WHICH I LOVE). THE WHEELS ARE EXTRA CHEAP PLASTIC THAT ARE ALREADY BENT AND COMING OFF. IT NOW IS HARD TO PUSH AND IS NOT SUCKING UP STUFF VERY WELL. I HAVE USED IT ABOUT 9 TIMES SINCE I GOT IT. VERY DISAPPOINTED.
customer_reviews.author: LANE JOHNSON

customer_reviews.title: I do appreciate Amazon handling it so efficiently but disappointed I have to restart my search for a vacuum ...
customer_reviews.text: It says it comes with extra long crevice tool. The directions in the box to put it together show the images of parts which has short and long crevice tool along with some other tools. My first order arrived missing the long crevice tool so Amazon in their awesomeness immediately sent a new one and it too is missing the part. It was one of the reasons I wanted this vacuum to be able to reach high spots. Returning second one now. I do appreciate Amazon handling it so efficiently but disappointed I have to restart my search for a vacuum with the tool I need.
customer_reviews.author: Marta

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Its really good for the price, I was on a budget and needed this so bad. I was nervous it was gonna feel cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Tawauna Temple

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Light, Extremely Plastic, Extremely Usable
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is constructed of cheap plastic, the kind that will crack or bust if you stare at it too long. Plus side is that this vac is extremely lightweight and easy to move. Keep that in mind when vacuuming and be gentle with it, and you will actually have a great vacuum cleaner for the money spent. It has great suction and a nice wide track for bigger homes. Plenty usable with the handle extension and provided accessories. So far I am happy with its performance and bang for the buck performance. No carpet, only used on tiled floors.
customer_reviews.author: Brett A.

customer_reviews.title: easy to maneuver
customer_reviews.text: It's lightweight, easy to maneuver, picks up dog hair with ease (thankfully!!), and the wand is my favorite thing about it!
customer_reviews.author: Pip

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly powerful
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy what I considered a "cheap" vacuum but this is a pretty amazing machine, especially for the price. Pet hair - no problem. Dust and debris on bare floors - no problem. Easy to empty the canister and a LOT more quiet than I anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: Awesome vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This baby may be light as a feather, but goes after dirt in catpets like a straving anteater at a picnic. Cannister is big, but I had to empty it twice in two rooms as it was getting the trampled-in pet hair the old vacuum couldn't get anyway. When the colour of the carpets change, they are clean! Used the upholstry attachment on the cat tower and now it looks nearly new.
customer_reviews.author: P. A. Potter

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight vacuum for cheap!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this vacuum for a month. I bought it because it's lightweight and my daughters now have one less excuse to avoid vacuuming our 3 level townhome. I am extremely pleased so far especially since I only paid $60 and it replaced my very expensive, very heavy, Dyson upright that broke within the first 30 days I owned it. Admittedly, it lacks some bells and whistles at that price point, but its very functional. Pros: Super lightweight, low cost, easy to empty, good suction, on board tool storage, washable filter Cons: No retractable cord, the "port" where the hose de/reattaches to use the tools doesn't have a clip to release or secure the hose.
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: This machine runs with a high pitched whine - Be warned.
customer_reviews.text: It does a good job of vacuuming - BUT - there is a very obnoxious high pitched whine with it. I am not particularly sensitive to noise but I had to wear head phones to reduce the noise somewhat. If you have dogs or if you are at all sensitive to noise- this is NOT the machine for you. I can't believe they didn't notice this in the production process. My box did not include the turbo brush - but I can live without that. I did LIKE the maneuverability and the size of the vacuum - it was easy to vacuum under and around furniture.
customer_reviews.author: mamabear

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality bad product Q&A
customer_reviews.text: It came with chunk broken out of handle. Cheap looks like a cheap toy. It is missing telescoping crevice tool. I was desperate my good hoover broke. I used it suction decent but can't see it lasting long. Use caution when you take it out to empty bottom latch caught on vacuum dumped fine dust out. This is going back awful.
customer_reviews.author: christie killian

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal
customer_reviews.text: Eureka should be commended for this outstanding vacuum cleaner. How awesome is it that they made such an economical and efficient model. I just unboxed it today and used it for the first time. All I can say is “I am so impressed”! Works Great on carpenter and the bare floor. I Like many people, was a bit skeptical due to the incredible low price. But the powererful pull this vacuum provides is phenomenal. I couldn’t be more pleased. My husband is just as impressed. Eureka came through with its good name and reputation. If you are contemplating buying this.. do it. You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, but $60
customer_reviews.text: I had a eureka several years ago. Paid $60 and it worked great. Good suction. This eureka, same price but newer, seems to be made so much cheaper. Flimsy plastic almost like a toy. The suction is good. That's what I really care about. An extremely short hose which I don't like. But for the price and suction, I'll keep it. I've had expensive ones too and not impressed. So whatever time I get out of this I can say I only spent $60.00 . And I did notice there is blowback dust from it. Not in love with it, but whatever.
customer_reviews.author: NJ mom

customer_reviews.title: Not versatile
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected from the excellent reviews. Scratches my floors. Cannot reach in tight spaces or under furniture. I ordered another vacuum shortly after getting this one
customer_reviews.author: Carly Marie

customer_reviews.title: definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have been pleasantly surprised by this machine! It's very light and ' feels ' cheep so my expectations weren't too high, however, This thing has great suction and couldn't believe how much dirt it picked up after only a week that my old one had broken down! Now I love it, as soon as my floors are a little dirty I bring it out because it's so light it doesn't take much effort to do a quick sweep! After 3 months it's as charming as ever! The only partial down side is the shorter hose to reach corners but that hasn't keep me from liking the vacuum as a whole.
customer_reviews.author: snyder

customer_reviews.title: Good for someone who doesn’t vacuum daily
customer_reviews.text: It cleans up my cats hair pretty well on our couch, we have no stairs so I’m not sure on that but it’s great with crumbs under cushions. The down side to this vacuum is the cheap hose. Mine has broken almsot in half in two spots. I’ve taped it to make it last a little longer since I only bought it 3 months ago. It’s only good if you don’t plan to use it often. A daily vacuum for a mother, this is not the one for you. Kids are messy, vacuums get used a lot and this one wears very fast. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Not what I had hoped for
customer_reviews.text: I want to like this vacuum, but two things are bothersome: the tube used to clean under things or in corners is extremely short. I cannot reach most of where I'm trying to reach. Second, the front filter is vented, so as you're vacuuming, air is being pushed out the vents and blowing the dust/dirt everywhere, thus, leaving much dirt behind.
customer_reviews.author: Heather D

customer_reviews.title: Great suction and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Has great suction, good for cat hair. Rugs look really clean when done. Not too heavy . A snap to empty the canister. Have not dealt with the filters yet, so I don't know how that will go. I am really pleased with it. A bargain price for a good vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: a critic

customer_reviews.title: so far, so good
customer_reviews.text: Turned this vacuum on and cleaned one room after using my old vacuum. Gross!!! The amount of dirt and cat hair filled up the cannister. Yes the hose is short, it doesn't bother me. The suction is great and makes you see what other vacuums miss.
customer_reviews.author: mama mandi

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORTH TRYING!
customer_reviews.text: This started out to be a good value. However after two months the vacuum started spitting out dust and lost suction. After following all problem solving recommendation s, I gave up. You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY IT!!
customer_reviews.text: This product worked for a month before the suction weakened. The versatility was great while it lasted as the attachable vacuum heads worked wonders for removing cobwebs and dust from high places. Unfortunately, the vacuum abruptly stopped working and now I'm unable to receive a refund because return window has expired. SAVE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.author: Che

customer_reviews.title: Loud and heats up fast, but does work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this several months ago, and wanted to use it before writing a review. At first, this vacuum was pretty great for the price, some whistling noise but otherwise worked well! However, after multiple uses I found that the whistling sound only gets louder, to the point of being harsh on the ears. The vacuum also now heats up really fast when I use it for more than 5 minutes at a time, and sometimes has a weird plastic burning smell with the heat, so I can only use this in short bursts. Not worth an investment but if you need a vacuum for the occasional mess, it should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, plastic, terrible suction from minute one!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible, cheap vacuum. Just awful, doesnt pick up obvious stuff like grass or crumbs. I brought i would try a less expensive vacuum because the Shark brand starts off good but within 6 months it's terrible. I was hoping to spend less and 6 months use out of this one but at least i thought it would be good. All i can say is that the vacuum is a waste of money from minute one. Cheap, flimsy plastic, the cord is so short i have to unplug it to get to the next room. Big disappointment. Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Karina

customer_reviews.title: Far better than the expensive “pet vacs”
customer_reviews.text: I have wasted probably $1000 on higher priced vacuums that just haven’t been able to stand up to our pets. We have a dog and seven cats, a vacuum that doesn’t clog and is easy to clean is a must. This inexpensive little gem has outperformed a $300 Bissel and two Shark vacuums, all that were supposed to be perfect for pets. Save your money, I love this Eureka so much I bought a second one- one for each floor of the house. (I have osteoarthritis in my spine, it was worth it.) It doesn’t come with a million attachments I’ll never use, it does not clog, it’s easy to empty and the filter is washable.
customer_reviews.author: Debs

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the cheapest, poorly made appliances Ive ever used. It is cheap plastic and very loud. The suction is so weak that It couldn't handle the simplest of dirty tasks. I spilled sugar on the hardwood floor and the attachment with the hair on the hose wouldn't suck up all the sugar. Sugar, good old fashioned white dominos sugar. I used the main part of the vacuum to vacuum up dirt on a hard wood floor and it pushed it every where and made a bigger mess then before I started. I can't believe Eureka put their name on this. Do NOT BUY THIS JUNK
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made but great suction
customer_reviews.text: Pros: incredible suction, great cleaning power, excellent price, lightweight Cons: cheaply made, flimsy plastic, poor construction This vacuum works unbelievably great, however, it is made of very cheap plastic- which is too bad it actually out performs most vacuums I have used. The price makes up for the flimsy construction, but it makes no sense that such a good vacuum is such a piece of crap. So in my opinion, 5 plus stars for performance, 2 stars for quality-the designers at Eureka should really rethink this.
customer_reviews.author: Sorceress052

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.text: It's cheap and performs that way. On bare floors it blows the dirt out of the front AND back of the vacuum head. It's bulky and cumbersome and the chord seems shorter than other vacuums I've had in the past. Also, the hose for the detachable wand is too short. If you're buying this as your primary vacuum, I'd recommend spending a little more and getting a better brand or model. I only purchased this one to have as a back up if I can't use my roomba.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is very affordable. But it’s not the greatest. It leaves a lot of debri behind, the hose is short, and it tends to tumble over when your using the hose. I don’t like it. You get what you pay for . Update: A week after . So the vacuum cleaner doesn’t pick up much . It does some , I always end up sweeping and then using the vacuum . So what’s the vacuum doing ? If I’m sweeping ? Invest a little more on something better . I’m sad this didn’t work for me .
customer_reviews.author: Kittties

customer_reviews.title: This did not come with the crevice, brush, or upholstery tools!!!
customer_reviews.text: I would not do anything which said Eureka ever again. It did not come with accessories and I just talked to the person to call and she said it never came with the accessory tools. Nevertheless the box shows it. I have just purchased another vacuum and needless to say it is a different brand and much more expensive. Do not go this route. It is a mistake!!!
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: There are no height settings!
customer_reviews.text: I was under the impression that the yellow switch, which in theory regulates the height, was not working, so I opened the bottom of the vacuum to see what the switch does. Well, it does nothing at all! The yellow plastic you see in the photo should regulate the height by being in contact with the smaller black plastic piece to the right; problem is that it doesn’t even touch it because of the bigger black piece. So rotating the switch doesn’t change anything at all. The main problem here is that the yellow piece is too short, and I’m not the first one noticing this. Feels like a scam to me...
customer_reviews.author: Jessica W.

customer_reviews.title: The worse
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy Cheap plastic toy Hose disconnects if you move it at all Doesn’t stay locked upright And handle won’t unlock I waited too long to try it and now can’t return because it’s been 45 days Wish they specified return times when purchasing products So many other places do 90 days especially with COVID
customer_reviews.author: Maurissa

customer_reviews.title: Not for serious cleaning
customer_reviews.text: Having 6 dogs it really doesn't pick up very well. It surely was disappointing. I guess it would be ok for light housework but I was looking for something with more power
customer_reviews.author: ruth

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in this vacuum especially seeing the positive reviews were so high. I have vacuumed rugs, carpet and bare floors. It leaves a line of dirt on one side of the vacuum as you go over the floor. As if it sucks from one side and then drops it on the other side. Even when you try different angles. Would not recommend this unit at all.
customer_reviews.author: CCmelak

customer_reviews.title: AWFUL PRODUCT! DON'T PURCHASE!
customer_reviews.text: This is all plastic and literally falls to pieces. There is no suction with tools and the air blows so hard out that it blows away dust and debris so that it never gets sucked up. If this had been an in-person purchase I would have never bought it. It feels like a toy and was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee Krause

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: i bought this a few weeks ago--believe me when i say i love this new vacuum! The old vacuum i had broke down (it started smoking) so i needed a new one. It has different settings such as high and low, even one for the bare floor! Oh the carpet lines, incredible ASMR...i wish i my carpet could give me very distinct carpet lines. i could spend hours with this vac making patterns. It's also very lightweight a lot less weighty than the old vacuum. Also worth a mention, the bright blue and yellow color is great too.
customer_reviews.author: anc

customer_reviews.title: Suction is awful!
customer_reviews.text: Awful vacuum. Used it to clean my living room one time and it clogged easily. After unclogging the vacuum completely i realized the suction was not as powerful as the reviews said. I ordered a replacement. Not only was the replcement process would but the tracking of the return went on knots two weeks after i dropped it off. The replacement vacuum is having the same issues. Cutting my losses and realizing I’m out $60
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, long cord, easy to use. Not enough spots for accessories, not super powerful. Great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica G

customer_reviews.title: Finally found a vacuun that would do it all...including cat hair!...
customer_reviews.text: Love it...best vacuum I ever purchased!...and I have bought several for far more money!...Light, easy, however, didn't have a clue to actually work it at first and wished it had a longer (telescopic) extender...but, think that is the next level...and can handle it just the way it is! Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Betty B

customer_reviews.title: Hard to push!
customer_reviews.text: I should’ve trusted the previous reviews I read about this vacuum... It is a workout in itself to just push it! It has levels to choose from for various carpet levels...pointless. I chose this vacuum because it was inexpensive but had the Eureka name. I live in an apartment on the East Coast for work, and a house on the West Coast, so I was trying not to spend much on my apartment appliances. Boy did I blow it with this choice. It wasn’t worth boxing up to send back! I’d say this is definitely a poor model.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Know what you are buying.
customer_reviews.text: It has good sucking work good on hard floors an carpets. The filter not good. Dust an dirt blows through the filter. Why use the vacuum if you or putting the dust back in the air and the floor. I wish Eureka had the vacuum back and I had my money back. It cost more to ship it back too Amazon then I payed for it. It needs a better filter.
customer_reviews.author: George M.

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a Gift, My Daughter absolutely Loves this Vacuum!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Eureka Vacuum Cleaner for my daughter who lives out of state. Her vacuum motor had blown and she was without a vacuum for a large home with roommates so very messy! This vacuum was not only on sale, but according to her, it’s one of the best vacuums she’s ever had, including the Roomba I guess. She says it made the carpet in the house look like new again and she’s very happy with it. She says the suction is unbelievably strong, and it’s easy to use and maintain. She gave it 5 Stars!
customer_reviews.author: LeeLee Stramer

customer_reviews.title: Ok for light to medium jobs
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is very light. Toy light. It reminds me of playing house as a kid. It seems to do an adequate job, no complaints after 1 month of daily vacuuming. I don't care for the set-up of the pedals though. Why are both the handle release and power on the left? Aren't most people right-handed/footed? And they are too close together. Not very practical. Since it was only $80, not bad, but I wouldn't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: gigi

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well
customer_reviews.text: Love this vacuum! Been looking for a good affordable option and this one does the job so well, while being pretty lightweight. Use it to get dust from couch, carpet and hard to reach places. The cord is long which allows for great cleaning distance before unplugging. Also comes with various attachments to help clean rugs, couches and thin areas. Very easy to clean and empty contained and doesn’t take up too much space.
customer_reviews.author: NikiMuffin

customer_reviews.title: Suction power, lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I have a heavy-duty HEPA vacuum cleaner but its too heavy to use 2-3 times a week, the Eureka works great for vacuuming daily if I decide to, lightweight, moves around the rooms easily, it has good suction so I feel like I can breathe better after vacuuming. The Eurekas appearance looks like its a childs vacuum--bright color, plastic inexpensive appearance, but I was pleasantly surprised when I started vacuuming, it gave me great satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: Carrera

customer_reviews.title: Vacuum broke within two months of gentle use
customer_reviews.text: I was happy enough when it first arrived, it's pretty affordable and at first did the job, I've had it since the end of March and today, beginning of June, it started smoking during routine use, I turned it off let it rest, when I went back to see how it was doing the suction has stopped working and it won't pick anything up, it will still turn on but that's about it, I'm pretty disappointed it was used pretty lightly and has already stopped working :/ in the end i'll have to spend more needing to replace it so soon, not really worth it even with it being a cheaper option
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great basic vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Great vacuum for the money. I purchased it to clean up cat litter from the carpet around the boxes and it works great. I’ve used it for carpet and hardwood floor and it works well on both surfaces. It even pulled up some of the carpeting material (brand new carpet that was installed) which I’ve only ever had happen with a Dyson so this one is pretty powerful. I was scared of the reviews that said it was super loud but I didn’t find it any louder than your typical vacuum....great vacuum if you want something basic under $100...also super light which I appreciate.
customer_reviews.author: Hkpink18

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating to use
customer_reviews.text: I needed to give it a 4-star because the Suction power was great but only went with nap very hard to go back and fourth The brush roller did not leave a clean path It left a mark down the center like there wasn't a brush roller in the very middle So you needed to keep going back over where you just vacuumed to try and get the mark to go away I have one short hair cat and it did pick up the fur But cleaning the tube was horrible Fur and dirt gets stuck at the very top and I had to dig it out The bottom did not dump clean
customer_reviews.author: just me

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I am 74. I have purchased many different vacuum cleaners in my life - one for over $1000. And none of them can compare to the cleaning power of this one. I have two cats - hence cat hair. But what surprised me is the fact I filled half the container in 10 minutes in one area 15x10 feet. Laminated floors? No problem. Change the setting and go! Lightweight, easy to assemble and run - easily one of the best purchases I have ever made.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Luckenbill

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: This $70 vacuum seems to do the same job as my old and now broken Dysen except that this is a bit more difficult to push. I've gone through a bunch of vacuums. Some make a lot of noise but don't pick up a lot of stuff in the carpet. This Eureka unit seems to work well. I have a short haired dog and a long hair cat. I don't have any stairs so I can't rate that.
customer_reviews.author: congamike

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: I like the lightness of the vacuum. I'm petite so it works great that its not heavy for me to push around. The suction power has been great so far. I gave it a one star because this model did not come with a brush as a standard piece. The plastic also looks and feels a bit cheap, I'm hoping that it won't break as we accidentaly hit corners while not being rough etc.
customer_reviews.author: BabyBush

customer_reviews.title: SO HAPPY - it’s light!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I had massive back surgery a year ago. I can pick this vacuum up with 1 hand, carry it up stairs, and still be able to vacuum. Easy cleanup. The only thing I don’t like is how eureka creates the handle. It’s functional, but not aesthetically pleasing ... so I ignore it because of the lightness, functionality and price point.
customer_reviews.author: Harpist1

customer_reviews.title: It's inconvenient but still OK
customer_reviews.text: For the price its what you expect the only thing I don't like and I consider it a big inconvenience and had known I would have never ordered it, you have to unhook the hose and attach it to the hand held wand (also the handle when using upright) then back when you want to use it to sweep your floors, its a pain switching the hose like that, so you try to make sure you don't miss anything to prevent having to switch the hose again.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine2

customer_reviews.title: Decent but has a flaw.
customer_reviews.text: Love it except....too often it shoots debris and crumbs UNDER the vacuum and back onto my feet. Hate having to vacuum the same area eight times ... Helps by keeping filter super clean. Just a little debris starts causing this issue. On carpet it doesn't do it that I notice but bare floor it does.
customer_reviews.author: Zombie Trucker

customer_reviews.title: Nice vacuum and great price! Highly recommend for the price range!
customer_reviews.text: Great vacuum for the price! Very easy to assemble in just a minute or 2! Very strong suction power. My rugs looked very clean but was amazed with all the dust it picked up. The attachment hose/handle is very nice to get those hard to reach places up high, behind furniture, around the edges of walls, and stairs. Very nice design, light weight, and easy to maneuver and handle. Even my 7 year old daughter was able to handle it like a pro! 😆 I highly recommend this product! Only time will tell how durable it is or how long it will last but again for the price I am happy!
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: This is my husband's favorite vacuum cleaner.
customer_reviews.text: Due to age, our household has divided the chores. I have a bad back, so my husband does the vacuuming. No, he doesn't do it like I would, but the fact that he loves this vacuum and wants to do it makes me happy. I don't care what vacuum he uses, as long as he wants to use this to get the job done. It has good suction, picks up animal hair pretty good. I don't use it on the stairs - it's too bulky for me. Not that it wouldn't work on stairs, I just don't use this tool to clean the stairs. And the husband doesn't do stairs.
customer_reviews.author: Lulabelle

customer_reviews.title: 3 belts broken in 4 months
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is not good for area rugs! It eats them alive! Therefore when a rug corner gets sucked up the belt instantly breaks! Not so good on carpeted rooms either. I have been using it on the highest floor setting. I have very low carpets but even the on the highest floor setting I can't even move the vacuum. It just pulls up carpet fibers like crazy! I DO like a vacuum with good suction capabilites but this is ridiculous! It will ruin anything you use this vacuum on!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly J. Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: I was displeased with this item from the very first time I used it. It is lightweight but that is the only good quality it has. If I still had the box I would send it back. I’ve had it for less than one month and I’m already shopping for a replacement. Spend the extra $40 for something worthwhile.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It looks like a blue plastic toy but it cleans very well and is quite powerful.
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of the reviews before I purchased this vacuum cleaner but I figured this has to be better than the vacuum I had before. As soon as it came, I took it out of the box - very easy to set up - went to work right away and cleaned up my house! It gets that dirt and dust right up. This cleaner is very light and doesn't stay upright when you're using the attachment to dust high and low places . I've only had this vac for a week, so I can't say how long it'll last. So far, so good. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DANO

customer_reviews.title: VERY powerful Indeed!
customer_reviews.text: We previously had a vacuum that didn't perform well. So we were trying to find something that was not too expensive but can do the job. When you first open the box, you will think this is like a toy. The body is really like what other people have described, plastic and looks kinda cheap. However, do not be fooled by this. It works really good and the suction is really powerful. The sound is not as loud as my previous useless vacuum. I was surprised but this is a really good bargain considering the price. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Damian

customer_reviews.title: Great & lightweight but beware it’s loud!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good light weight vacuum. I was sick of lugging my canister vac up and down the stairs. The accessory hose is really short and the attachments feel kinda cheap. The vacuum itself works well and cleans carpet and hard floors. The dirt canister is easy to empty and the empty from the bottom feature is nice. My main complaint with this vacuum is that it sounds like a freight train! It’s SO loud!! I took one star away for it being super loud and one for it not being good for stairs due to the short accessory hose.
customer_reviews.author: jeremy klumper

customer_reviews.title: Does not work on hard wood floors
customer_reviews.text: This machine might be ok on carpet, but it doesn't even try to pickup anything on the left hand side of the vacuum head. So half the machine is almost good, but the other half is not. Yes it uses the same brush all the way across and that spins and works as it should, but still doesn't seem to work on the left hand side as you push it away from you. What a waste of $60.00
customer_reviews.author: Phillip A. Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Broken in 2 months
customer_reviews.text: EDIT - got a new belt, got that on okay but now the height won’t adjust at all or turn the brushroll off for bare floors. I’m SO MAD MYSELF for buying this junk. Changed to 1 star review. Loved this at first, BUT NOW it’s already broken. It won’t suck up debris of many sizes/weights, and the belt is already broken. That wouldn’t affect why it won’t suck on hard floors though. I’m sitting with it apart in front of me and really ticked. Total crap.
customer_reviews.author: Kalm1980

customer_reviews.title: A great vacuum for a good price.
customer_reviews.text: I need another vacuum for my 2nd home. Was plan to just purchase the same one that I got last year. So glad I came across this one! Loved this vacuum, it’s everything that I asked for: light weight, strong suction, good design with common sense. And, the price was only 1/3 of another similar vacuum I purchased last year!
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: very dysfunctional company
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant from the start because the price was so low, but there were enough good reviews that I took a chance on it. It came only with French instructions, so putting it together with dark images was going the be fun. On looking at the pictures of the attachments, I realized that at least three were missing. I tried calling the company, but their phone is either off the hook, or they're busy dealing with other irate customers. That's as far of a chance I decided to give it. I'll spend a little more for peace of mind. Kinda of like Russia circa 1960's.
customer_reviews.author: Harold Rail

customer_reviews.title: Scratched up my hardwood floor!  Does not vacuum well.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item due to the price and good reviews. However, I have had a completely different experience than that. I set the vacuum to the bare floor setting and started using it on my hardwood floor. The first thing I noticed is that it blew the dust and dog hair around more than it actually sucked it up. But worst of all, I noticed that it had left a long scratch mark on my floor trailing behind it. I look on the bottom of the unit and there are two little points on the back. One of them was scraping on the floor as I was pushing the unit forward. I cannot recommend this vacuum at all.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Sting suction light weight vaccum
customer_reviews.text: So this thing is uglier in person BUT with that being said , it works great. I just vacuumed my rug that I use my smaller vaccum on several times a day and it got up so much. I was amazed . I had to take a picture. I didn't realize my little vaccum was missing so much( it looks like dust ). I might purchase another one if these just to keep downstairs for our rug. But the again , this thing is so light I might not mind bringing it downstairs often. It only took 3-5 minutes to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Jarvis

customer_reviews.title: Great suction value for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have the fortune or misfortune of purchasing multiple vacuums for myself and my children’s housed. This is by far one of our favorites. I wanted an affordable vacuum that would be good for long hair and for multiple cats. This one is great for both as well as the usual dirt and debris. We even used it for some small renovation clean up, and I am please and a little embarrassed to admit that it picked up loose screws very well with a great deal of noise, but no damage, no loss of power, and no clogs. Great suction value for the price
customer_reviews.author: bluchez

customer_reviews.title: Great for picking up dog hair
customer_reviews.text: I tested this on just one small hallway rug and could not believe how much dog hair and dust and dirt it pulled out that I didn’t even know was there. The suction is amazing for a cheaper vacuum. I have two dogs and this picked up their hair so well. Almost got a full five stars but ended up getting four due to the fact that is does feel cheaply made, which I guess makes sense because it is cheaper than some vacuums. I just hope it last long. Also, it’s pretty noisy. It’s a lot louder than any other vacuum I’ve had. But for the price I do think it’s worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Value for money!!! Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great vacuum and great value for money !!! I personally have found this vacuum to be very handy, it didn’t cost me a lot but it sure has helped a whole lot. I vacuum my bare floor with this including closets and walls and my staircase. Love it. Had a bit of difficulty getting off scarce fuzzies stuck into my carpet but that’s because the fibers had clung. This vacuum gets everything very clean and is super handy with its attachments. It isn’t perfect in suction power but I do believe it’s powerful enough and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought a returned item and although packaging wasn’t great, everything works and it’s pretty light. Vacuuming has been a breeze. I like how you can adjust the height by lowering it for hardwood floor (what we have) and then also raise for rugs and carpets. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica S

customer_reviews.title: Picks up well
customer_reviews.text: This vaccum does a pretty good job picking up dirt and hair. I used it on the carpet in our small apartment and it picked up a lot I saw all the dirt in the dust cup. It also worked at picking up the sand that our cat kicked out of his litter box onto the floor. The instructions says it comes with a turbo brush though but I don't think one came with mine. I did get the other accessories included with the vaccun though. So far I like this vaccum and it is a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: 5 ⭐ all the way around. I clean for a living and would highly recommend this vacuum. I was skeptical before purchasing but am so glad i went ahead and got it. It works great on pet hair!! Most of my customers have dogs and this vaccum works wonders. However i only use this on carpeted floors so i can't vouch for how it works on bare floors. Would definitely recommend this if you're in the market for a cheap, lightweight, high quality vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: q

customer_reviews.title: Your Cleaning Helper for a Multi-Story Home
customer_reviews.text: If you have a multi story home - this is going to be your new favorite cleaning helper! I was very skeptical when buying this budget friendly vacuum but I really needed one and was on a tight budget. So I took a chance AND more than a year later it is serving me well! Maintenance costs are zero! It is so light weight to carry between the 3 floors in our home and it does a great job cleaning! You would want to buy this one before you splurge on any super expensive vacuum just to give it a try!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Carbonado

customer_reviews.title: •_•
customer_reviews.text: Got this product December 2nd 2019, worked amazing! I was so pleased.. until today January 30th 2020 when I was vacuuming and it just shut off. And won’t turn back on. If you’re looking for a vacuum that you can only use a handful of times, this ones for you! If you want one that will actually last you more than 2 months, I’d suggest something else
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Romero

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy - junk product.
customer_reviews.text: For a low end vacuum I guess I should have low expectations. The suction with the hose is so weak it can suck up visible dirt on my vinyl kitchen floor. Stairs are a joke, I think they appear cleaner because the dirt has been blown off of them not because anything has been sucked up. I would NOT recommend this vacuum. If you do buy it, go ahead and add some ear plugs to your cart. We have 2 large dogs and I plan to purchase another shark vacuum. Not sure I can return this one with everyone on lock down {sigh}
customer_reviews.author: Lauri T

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Finally A Vacuum That Picks Up Everything
customer_reviews.text: OK - For the price I do not believe you can pass this one up! It is light weight and glides on carpeting and onto my laminate flooring and picks up everything without blowing it all around (including cat hair) Yay! The suction is great. Has a long electrical cord (another plus). emptying debris container is a breeze. Now I have only had this vacuum for 1 month - I am keeping my fingers crossed hoping it will last me a long time. Well I guess there is one negative for me and that is the attachment hose is a little short but I can deal with that.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary

customer_reviews.title: Just don't do it
customer_reviews.text: So you for sure get what you pay for. The first vacuum I bought started pouring out smoke the second time it was used. It was replaced and this new vacuum sounds like a small airplane and is VERY hard to push. I feel like my replacement might be refurbished 1 because it's so loud and 2 it came with a completely different handle than the other in a different color than the test of the vacuum. Needless to say but I do not recommend this vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: donn quist

customer_reviews.title: Great on deep pile/soft carpet!
customer_reviews.text: What a little gem! As others have stated, it is a little flimsy, which is to be expected for the price. I also cannot attest to the durability, as I’ve only had it for a few months. However we were struggling with other, much more expensive vacuums, on deep pile carpet, but this one glides right over it. On the first use, I could see what it picked up and I was pleasantly surprised. Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Katie G.

customer_reviews.title: For the price it works well.
customer_reviews.text: Acceptable design, strong vacuum suction, good brush roller, light, wide power head, and good price. It does feel like inexpensive plastic, but this is a throw away unit by design. Works very well for pet hair. The only dislike is not having a 3-way switch to turn off roller brush when using attachments. Bagless units like this one requires a very good cleaning of power head, tube, and waste container after use. About 120psi solves that problem, and it’s quick.
customer_reviews.author: RLB DAB

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t reach but is just fine for floors but is also bulky. Easy clean and good suction .
customer_reviews.text: Suction is pretty good. But the hose on this is so short that it kept knocking over when I would use the extensions and while kneeling down kept falling on my head . Sooo aggravating . Why not just make the hose longer that’s what it’s for . It reaches maybe a foot then knocks down on top of you constantly. Can’t reach the top of curtains or low on baseboards without it flipping over .
customer_reviews.author: Melissa h

customer_reviews.title: Awesome vacuum for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is the best vacuum I have ever used! I bought it after my expensive Hoover (passed down to me from my parents) snapped in half and was unusable. I picked this one because it was inexpensive and had decent reviews, but I was super surprised at how great it is. I was able to assemble it on my own in under 2 minutes and I tested it out right away. My one bedroom apartment has both carpet and wood floors, and it did great on both surfaces. I love the dial that you can turn for different types of flooring and the add-ons for upholstery.
customer_reviews.author: Katie C.

customer_reviews.title: Good Vacuum, but does look like it belongs in an episode of power rangers
customer_reviews.text: For the price I think the vacuum is great. The suction power is really good and its nice and lightweight. If you're looking for a sleek and stylish vacuum this might not be for you, but if you just want a clean floor and don't want to spend a bagillion dollars, then this is the one! I don't have pets so I don't know how well it does with pet hair... but it does pick up people hair :) FYI I wrote this review after using the vacuum for about one month so the one thing I can't comment on is the longevity/durability.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: We cleaned our floors about a week before ordering this new vacuum. We looked into reviews and pricing before deciding on this one. Absolutely love it! The amount of dirt and pet hair this got out of one room was just amazing! And we had just cleaned! We have used this to deep clean our entire apartment and love it! Our only complaint is that the hose for all the attachments isn’t long....at all. So you either have to lift and carry the vacuum or constantly hold it up so it won’t fall over. But still amazing for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Parkhurst

customer_reviews.title: Not as Good as I Thought
customer_reviews.text: First of all, it is lightweight and suction is ok. However, it does NOT get under any areas that are normal 2 feet off ground areas, as in I cannot vacuum under the floating night stands on either side of the bed. Forget going under any beds. I still have to use my canister vacuum to get at those areas. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: C. Pohlman

customer_reviews.title: Suction is Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: If you need a vacuum that will pick up anything, this is the one! You can adjust how low or high you need the suction to be (hard floor vs carpet). The vacuum is light and easy to move around on the carpet. It is a little bulky and the hose is a little short. The hose does still sution up everything, you just need to move the vacuum with you every step. This vacuum is one of the louder ones I have ever had, but it doesn't bug me because I would rather have amazing suction then worry about how loud it is.
customer_reviews.author: Hill

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money on this machine!!
customer_reviews.text: Machine was put together, and I made sure it was working. Two days later I was ready to vacuum my tile floors. It does nothing but blow sand and debris around instead of picking it up. Owner’s manual says check for debris. There is no debris. It was used for only a minute to check that it was functioning. I have owned Eureka vacuum cleaners, even a small cordless and used it for several years. I loved it!! This vacuum cleaner is junk and a huge disappointment. I may as well have thrown my money right out of a window. 😡
customer_reviews.author: Linda A.

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Surprised to see the amount of dust hidden in my carpet. The downside is that it is a bit heavy to move around. It makes a lot of noise. And the plastic design looks cheap (which makes it look like a big toy). These can all be justified by the price though.
customer_reviews.author: S

product_meta.title: Eureka PowerSpeed Bagless Upright Vacuum Cleaner, Lite, Blue, Purple
product_meta.description:
Size:PowerSpeed Lite, BlueEureka knows you value a clean and healthy home. Our Eureka powerspeed is a fantastic vacuum for whole home cleaning. We want cleaning to suck less for you. The Eureka power speed all floor vacuum with attachments lets you give your house the clean it deserves without breaking your budget. Packed full of features like an XL dust cup, washable filter, accessories, and a wide nozzle, this lightweight but powerful vacuum cleaner won’t disappoint. Clean your floors and above with ease. It works on carpets, rugs, hardwood floors, cars, ceilings, lampshades, furniture, and more. Customer service: if you have any questions, please kindly contact our customer service team at customer service team at 1-800-282-2886.

*Actual product may vary in handle material due to manufacture issue. It might be original plastic or metal.
feature_bullets: Powerful vacuum cleaner: The dynamic motor and brushroll can lift stubborn and heavy debris. Plus, the 12. 6” wide nozzle cleans more with a quickness.
5 height adjustment: It works well on carpets, shag rug, hard floors etc. Smooth wheels ensures hardwood floors won’t sustain scratches or gouges.
4. 1L extra-large capacity: the extra-large dust cup holds more dirt and requires less frequent emptying. Clean more, empty less.

Multiple accessories included: a quick-release handle connected to the stretch hose for above-floor cleaning. A 7-inch-long crevice tool, dusting brush, and upholstery tool help clean hard-to-reach areas. Extract dirt, pet hair, freshen up your car, curtains, celings or door frames. For your convenience, they are all stored right on board.
Actual product may vary in handle material due to manufacture issue. It might be original plastic or metal.
10 lbs. lightweight upright vacuum: The EurekaPowerSpeed is pretty lightweight and easy to maneuver. Designed for whole home clean.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: This item is available for shipping in the U.S. except for California and to select countries outside the U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars9,377 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Crevice Tool, Dusting Brush, Pet tool, Uphostery tool Owner's Manual
